bibl.title: Four poll tax receipts on papyrus from the Early Roman Fayum
bibl.note: 1. P. Heid. Inv. G 1026. Receipt for Syntaxis. Theadelpheia, Nov., 16 - Aug., 15 BCE. - 2. P. Mich. Inv. 1986. Receipt for Syntaximon. Apias, 27 Jan. - 28 Oct., 7 CE. - 3-4. Poll Tax Receipts from the Harthotes Archive: 3. P. Mich. Inv. 4187. Receipt for Syntaximon. Theadelpheia, 26 Dec., 10 - 22 Jul., 11 CE; - 4. P.CtYBR [= P. Yale] Inv. 340. Receipt for Syntaximon. Theadelpheia, 27 Oct. - 3 Jun., 25 CE. - Appendix: Rereading P. Mil. [= P. Med.] I2, 9.
bibl.seg: 141.4 P. Heid. Inv. G 1026 P. Mich. Inv. 1986; 4187 P. Yale Inv. 340 145.4 P. Med. I, 9
W. Graham Claytor, Richard G. Warga & Zachary Smith, Four Poll Tax Receipts on Papyrus from the Early Roman Fayum.

1. P. Heid. Inv. G 1026. Receipt for Syntaxis. Theadelpheia, Nov., 16 - Aug., 15 BCE. - 2. P. Mich. Inv. 1986. Receipt for Syntaximon. Apias, 27 Jan. - 28 Oct., 7 CE. - 3-4. Poll Tax Receipts from the Harthotes Archive: 3. P. Mich. Inv. 4187. Receipt for Syntaximon. Theadelpheia, 26 Dec., 10 - 22 Jul., 11 CE; - 4. P.CtYBR [= P. Yale] Inv. 340. Receipt for Syntaximon. Theadelpheia, 27 Oct. - 3 Jun., 25 CE. - Appendix: Rereading P. Mil. [= P. Med.] I2, 9.
